With this fast-moving world, many technologies are evolving so fast that most organizations or business owners get confused while choosing the right technology to help them move forward without facing many obstacles in their path to success. That is where business intelligence comes into play and helps organizations achieve their desired target.

According to Statista, the revenue of the Business Intelligence Software segment is projected to reach US$23,258.94 m in 2021, and the market value to reach US$31,849.01 m by 2025.

Why Choose Business Intelligence Consulting?

Business Intelligence (BI) is among the most critical technologies that a company should always work on. It analyzes the data and business information. In more simple words, it lets businesses learn about any trend or process affecting performance, and it predicts what you have done wrong in the past and how you can improve it in the future.

An essential factor in business intelligence is the technology and the ability to create business intelligence dashboards. The right business intelligence company will exhibit more actionable data, give clear insights, and facilitate strategic decision-making. 

The companies listed below are chosen based on few parameters like (reviews of the company, reputation both online and offline, number of projects and type of projects done so far). All these parameters make these companies different from the other business intelligence companies and well ahead of the competition.

Top 7 Business Intelligence Consulting Companies you should reach out to for consulting Business intelligence to your organization. 

Teradata Corporation

Teradata Corporation is a leading provider of business intelligence consulting services that helps businesses unlock the value of their data to make informed decisions.

With over 40 years of experience in the field of data analytics, Teradata is well-positioned to deliver superior consulting services to organizations of all sizes across industries. It has a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals who have expertise in data warehousing, analytics, data management, and big data solutions.

Teradata is among the best Business Intelligence software companies offering consulting services that are built on its world-class software platform, designed to handle large-scale data analytics workloads. The platform provides a comprehensive set of tools and features that allow businesses to extract insights from their data quickly and efficiently.

Teradata’s Business Intelligence Consulting Services includes;

  • Data Integration Consulting Services
  • Data Warehousing Consulting Services
  • Business Intelligence Consulting Services
  • Advanced Analytics Consulting Services
  • Machine Learning Consulting Services
  • Data Science Consulting Services
  • Cloud Analytics Consulting Services
  • Big Data Consulting Services

The company’s experience, expertise, and world-class software platform make it a reliable and trusted partner for organizations looking to unlock the value of their data. With Teradata’s consulting services, businesses can make data-driven decisions that lead to better outcomes and improved business performance.

Teradata’s consulting services are also backed by a team of experts who are available round the clock to provide support and guidance to clients.

PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons is also considered as one of the best Business Intelligence software companies that helps many startups and companies complete their projects through Business Intelligence tools and techniques. 

PixelCrayons has 18+ years of experience and has done over 11500+ projects with 450+ employees. 

PixelCrayons can benefit your organizations in these areas:

  • BI Assessment and Technology Consulting
  • BI Data warehousing Assistance
  • BI Analysis & Reporting Support
  • BI Strategy Roadmaps
  • BI Software Solution Enhancement
  • BI Core Analytics

If you want to hire Business Intelligence company consultants for the projects related to the technologies listed above, I would suggest PixelCrayons as their experts have immense knowledge and working experience.

invertio

invertio is one of the best business intelligence software companies that helps many startups and companies complete their projects through BI strategies, designs, and optimizing BI architectures. 

invertio has been there in this industry for more than 20 years and done over 4200 projects with 2500+ customers. 

BI consultants of invertio help different companies to increase their data-centric environment to derive strategic business value from data of multiple origins. 

invertio Business Intelligence Solutions & Services are further divided into: 

  • BI Assessment and Technology Consulting
  • BI Data warehousing Assistance
  • BI Analysis & Reporting Support
  • BI Strategy Roadmaps
  • BI Software Solution Enhancement
  • BI Support and Maintenance
  • Data Visualization

Businesseses prefer outsourcing their BI consulting services to invertio because it is one of the best Business Intelligence consulting companies with high expertise and refined BI strategy. ValueCoder’s BI experts are proficient at the latest technologies to serve data solutions to enterprises.

If you want to hire employees for the projects related to the technologies listed above, I would recommend invertio as they have vast experience in Business Intelligence consultancy, and with that, there are experts who have immense knowledge and working experience.

Also Read – How Business Intelligence is Driving Success in Today’s Market

Spec India

SPEC INDIA is one of the best Business Intelligence consultancy companies that gives a range of enterprise-level business intelligence and analytics solutions that help you see beyond the data. 

Spec India’s business intelligence services include BI reporting, dashboarding, smart analytics, custom data visualization, data warehousing, and BI consulting to enhance overall business performance.

The Business Intelligence consultants help develop data-driven strategies that provide insights into key areas, identify emerging trends, support your decision-making process, and unlock the hidden value in data.

Their certified business intelligence consultants and BI analysts help companies of any size analyze, collect, visualize data and then transform it into actionable insights.  

What does Spec India offer?

  • BI Analytics
  • Data Warehousing
  • Data Modeling
  • ETL (Extract, Transform, Load)
  • Predictive Analytics
  • Dashboarding
  • Cloud BI
  • BI Architect
  • Cloud BI Migration

BI is among the top features to have in every organization. Every business intelligence company should go for this feature, and if you don’t have Business Intelligence consultants, you can outsource it from Spec India, as they have experts who have immense experience in this domain.

QBurst

QBurst is among the best Business Intelligence consulting companies with a strong focus on new-generation technology platforms. Their Business Intelligence companies assure that you have access to high-quality data, which is relevant, complete, and can help you gain a competitive advantage.

QBurst focus on these areas for Business Intelligence:

  • Quality Data Management
  • Master Data Management
  • Data Modelling
  • Data Warehouse development
  • Data Migration

QBurst is known for giving the best custom solutions to boost your business as they are one of the Business Intelligence consultants who have expertise in industry-leading DW/BI tools. You can connect with this company if you are finding it difficult to get ahead of the competition.

Sigma Data Systems

Sigma Data Systems help their clients to optimize their capabilities to leverage different types of data. Their business intelligence services include development and consulting, data visualization, and testing. 

At Sigma, their Business Intelligence consultants help your business overcome all the challenges by giving quality services. Their team of business intelligence experts collects all the data from different sources and makes it worthwhile for your organization.

What does Sigma Data Systems offer?

  • BI Analytics
  • Data Warehousing
  • Data Modeling
  • Custom Visualization
  • ETL (Extract, Transform, Load)
  • Predictive Analytics
  • BI Architect
  • Cloud BI Migration

Business intelligence (BI) links business analytics, data visualization, data mining, data tools and infrastructure, and best methods to help businesses make more data-driven decisions. And Sigma Data Systems is among those Business Intelligence software companies that know how to link all the tools and techniques to make the best outcome.

eLuminous Technologies PVT LTD

eLuminous Technologies is considered one of the best Business Intelligence companies, as it takes down every challenge pretty easily and gives the best results to the clients. This company is responsible for doing:

  • Report and dashboard designs
  • Data integration
  • Data warehousing
  • ETL graphic
  • Data Mining
  • Data Visualization

eLuminous implements top-notch BI design services via their team of highly experienced Business Intelligence consultants and developers.

Services provided by them are comprehensive and structured. They analyze the entire business processes providing detailed business solutions that are appropriate and insightful. 

All products and work are thoroughly cross-verified and tested, assuring your solution will work the first time around. All these reasons are enough to judge how efficient this company is to consult your Business Intelligence problems.

Datapine

Business Intelligence consulting services provided by Datapine help in the analysis and gain a better understanding from the data of different sources. It can also create professional dashboards visualizing your data that will answer your specific business needs.

What Datapine include in their consulting: 

  • Strategic Business Intelligence consulting
  • Dashboard creation and design
  • Data Management and ETL
  • Workshop and Classroom training

Let’s now discuss the key features of Business Intelligence consulting and the reasons why choose BI.

  • Faster adoption 
  • Effective change management
  • Competitive Advantage
  • Lower risk
  • Maximize ROI
  • New Valuable insights

Choosing the best company for consulting Business Intelligence or any other technology is quite tricky, as before working with any business intelligence company, how can you know that, will they be able to give you the desired results? In that case, what most businesses do is look for the reviews of the consulting company, their last few projects, and their reputation in the market. If we look at Datapine, they have done really well to maintain a good reputation in the market. 

You can easily go for this company if you are looking for one of the best business intelligence consulting firms.

Wrapping Up

Many companies in the world are providing Business Intelligence consulting services. Still, only a few are the best because the talent they have as Business Intelligence consultants is among the top in the world. The companies listed above are among the best and can give you the desired results. 

I would surely recommend you three best companies for Business Intelligence consulting companies based on research (parameters chosen: number of projects, reviews, and company history for Business Intelligence services).

  • Teradata Corporation
  • invertio
  • PixelCrayons
